name: Radio Ball 3D Free
description:
A fun, radioactive, fast-paced, accelerometer driven 3D game.

Radio Ball 3D! The accelerometer controlled tunnel game. A uranium ball driven by radioactive waste rushes through the tunnel. Can you reach the end?
Go as far as you can, collect power-ups, do combos, avoid or destroy obstacles. Get your score as high as possible and keep rollin'.
Play and compete with other players through OpenFeint.

Features:
☢ Combos
☢ Tilt control
☢ Smooth 3D graphics
☢ Dynamic, stunt-flavored gameplay
☢ Achievements, leaderboards and challenges (OpenFeint)

Full version game with ads by Greystripe and iAd.

"Radio Ball 3D is likely to keep you entertained for many weeks to come" - knowyourmobile.com

"Overall, Radio Ball is extremely addictive and may well ratchet up your heartbeats per minute" - pcworld.com
